text: Jan Ferdynand Olszewski (20 August 1930 in Warsaw - 7 February 2019 in Warsaw) was a Polish lawyer and political figure.The official website of the President of the Republic of Poland, "Jan Olszewski â€“ Political Advisor to the President", He is best known for serving as Prime Minister of the Republic of Poland from 1991 to 1992. Olszewski died after a long illness on 7 February 2019 in a Warsaw hospital, aged 88. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Warsaw Category:Prime ministers of Poland
title: Jan Olszewski
